thread.title: Disney to offer new British Isles itinerary
thread.title_full: Disney to offer new British Isles itinerary

author: Gene Sloan
title: Disney to offer new British Isles itinerary
text: Gene Sloan, USA TODAY Tuesday, March 07, 2017 Credit: USA Today No. 3: Disney Magic Class. One doesn’t even have to be a Disney fan to appreciate the beautiful ships Disney Cruise Line “imagined” with its 83,338-gt, 2,700-guest, 1998-built Disney Magic (shown) and 1999-built Disney Wonder. They convincingly evoke the great trans-Atlantic liners with their long bows, twin funnels (note how the aft funnel is slight taller) and dynamically coordinated angles and curves.
